Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Iindumiso zonke mazibe kuAllâh lowo ikokwaKhe konke okusemazulwini nasemhlabeni, yaye zezaKhe zonke iindumiso nakuBomi oBuzayo. Yena nguSobulumko, uSolwazi
Uyakwazi okungena emhlabeni noko kuphuma kuwo noko kuhla ezulwini noko kunyuka kuye kulo, kananjalo Yena nguSozinceba, nguMxoleli

Abo bangakholwayo bathi: “IYure ayiyi kusifikela thina.” Yithi wena: “Ewe! Ndifunga ngeNkosi yam, Iza kunifikela. (UAllâh) nguMazi wokungabonwayo.” Akukho nesuntswana elingakanani na elisitheleyo kuYe emazulwini okanye emhlabeni, enokuba lingalincinane na okanye libe likhulu kangakanani na, (libhaliwe) eNcwadini ecacileyo
Khona ukuze Avuze abo bakholwayo, benza izenzo zobulungisa. Abo banjalo baya kufumana ukuxolelwa nembonelo yexabiso
Kodwa abo bazabalaza ngokuchasene neeVesi zeThu, (bezama) ukuba zingaphumeleli; okwabo iya kuba sisohlwayo esibuhlungu
Ke bona abo banikwe ulwazi bayabona okokuba oko kutyhilwe kuwe kuvela eNkosini yaKho kuyinyaniso, yaye kukhokelela eNdleleni kaSobunganga, uSokudunyiswa
Abo bangakholwayo bathi: “Sinibonise indoda eza kunixelela ukuba xa sele nizizicwibi ngokupheleyo, niza kuphinda nidalwe ngokutsha (nibe) kwindalo entsha
Ingaba uqambe ubuxoki ngoAllâh kusini na okanye mhlawumbi uhlaselwe ngumoya omdaka, kusini na? “ Nakanye. Abo bangakholwayo kuBomi oBuzayo baya kuba sesohlwayweni yaye basekulahlekeni okukhulu

Kanti abakujongi na oko kuphambi kwabo noko kungemva kwabo kwamazulu nomhlaba? Ukuba beSithanda beSingenza umhlaba ubaginye okanye Senze bawelwe ziingceba zesibhakabhaka phezu kwabo. Inene kuko oko kukho umqondiso kuso nasiphi na isicaka esiguqukela (kuAllâh)
